Cookie Content Settings

Set whether to allow or block cookies in requests matching the primary pattern, while on a page matching the secondary pattern.

For example, setting the primary pattern to https://myaccount.com/* and the secondary pattern to *://*.example.com/* will allow cookies in https://myaccount.com requests (but not in sub-domain requests, e.g., https://storage.myaccount.com) while on any example.com page (including sub-domains).
